about-me.1: Hi! My name is David, I'm
about-me.2: years old and I'm a software development engineer from the FIB (Facultat d'Informàtica de Barcelona).
about-me.3: Currently I'm a PHP web developer, althought I'm also curious to know more about other areas like databases (BigData, Data Mining), IoT-SmartCities or mobile applications.
about-me.4: Continuous formation must be always present in a developer's DNA, that's why I'm ready to discover new areas, programming languages, metodologies or new technologies.
about-me.5: I'm cheerful, smiling, quiet and a bit shy. On my free time I usually like watching my favourite TV shows, series or movies, playing videogame, and share funny moments with the company of my family and friends.
about-me.6: If you want to know more about me, I invite you to take a moment to visit my LinkedIn profile, and for more details, contact me by email.

skills.php: Advanced skills on backend development of web apps. Solid experience with CodeIgniter framework.
skills.git: Essential skills and experience managing repositories.
skills.mysql: Advanced concepts on databases creation, design and optimization and building complex queries.
skills.html: Medium level skills on web and forms building.
skills.js: Creation of scripts for web pages and web applications. Familiar with native JS and jQuery.
skills.css: Basic concepts on designing and transforming web pages and web applications content. Experience with Bootstrap.
skills.android: Development of mobile applications of medium complexity through SDK. (Notifications management, SQlite databases and creation of REST API).
skills.vagrant: Scripts building for setting up virtual development environments.

experience.eoniantec: Internal development of new tools and features, software maintenance (bug fixing, optimization, cleaning tasks and refactorization), use of external marketing APIs (Facebook Ads, Google AdWords, etc.) for automated management of ads and generation of daily reports.

formation.degree: Bachelor Degree in Informatics Engineering - Universitat Politècnica de Catalunya
formation.studies: Bachelor Degree in Informatics Engineering studies (Information Systems) on Facultat d'Informàtica de Barcelona (FIB) of Universitat Politècnica de Catalunya (UPC)
